sentences.sentence: At present, Quebec is the only province with a personal data protection law in effect that applies to the provincially regulated private sector.
sentences.translation: 目前，魁北克省是唯一制定个人数据保护法并已生效的省份，这部法律适用于该省管辖的私人部门。

sentences.sentence: An experiment of integrating information technology into English language teaching methodology has been made on senior English majors in a provincially-administrated university.
sentences.translation: 对某省属高校英语专业高年级本科生进行了信息技术与英语学科教学论课程整合教学实验。
